https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2rRXCd2lMnQp6p9xrhWmCnUUSS.jpg "Colored Photograph" with an aesthetic reminiscent of the campaigns of United Colors of Benetton, Waheeda Malullah (Bahrain) chooses to color a group of women dressed in black Burqas, frozen in an almost fixed shot taken from the front.
